Description:
SPACE ! VIEWS ! 2 DWELLINGS MAYBE (STCA) , 2 CROSSOVERS.
Hard to get in an established area , where you can build your dream home now or wait until the time is right. The size and corner position of No. 48 allows for the chance to build 2 (STCA) , one for you , another for extended family or develop in the future. Bay views can be part of your new residence if desired.........just take the time to ring and talk , make an inspection now with me. A rare find here at No. 48 Dandarriga, on the edge of the residential pocket with the cullinary delights of the Bellarine Peninsula on your doorstep.

Description:
Bay Beach Living
Happiness hits as you are impressed by manicured gardens, exposed aggregate driveway, downstairs deck/veranda and the large sandstone bricks. Stepping inside finds you in the first living area with its own reverse cycle split system. Moving on to the left you will find the master bedroom with ceiling fan, built in robes plus a walk in robe alongside the stylish en-suite with Caesar stone benches, plenty of storage & huge shower. Another door takes you to a vast undercover alfresco that makes entertaining all year around a breeze in this zone with built in seating, a bar plus an outdoor kitchen with a double sink, plenty of cupboards & a great fridge cavity. Heading up the stairs to the second storey is a landing perfect for a study nook or display area with a tucked away double linen closet. Open plan elevated living is light filled with large windows to maximize views of the bay & Geelong that make this home something special to savor. This living sector has a reverse cycle split system & a wood heater to enjoy cozy winters watching storms sweep across the bay. A sliding door takes you outside to the decked undercover upstairs area perfect to enjoy a cheese platter or a cheeky wine with family & friends. Attractive kitchen features stainless steel appliances including electric oven, grill, 4 burner gas cook top, range hood & dish washer all overlooking the dining area. Bedroom 2 has 3 BIR's, ceiling fan & access to the classy 2 way bathroom again with Caesar stone benches, extra storage & large shower. Central laundry has convenient stairs for direct access to the backyard, chic timber back boards & overhead cupboards. Bedroom 3 has 2 BIR's & ceiling fan. Out the back is manicured hedge lined gardens, fire pit area, planter boxes perfect to grow vegetables & a barn style storage shed. All sitting pretty on a 585m2 block which backs onto a reserve. Close to local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport, medical facilities & everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, beaches, ferry services and wineries just to mention a few. So much bang for your buck you best be sure to have this on your future home shopping list.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
READY FOR YOUR STAMP
"State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 20 people, social distancing still applies"
In real estate we often use words like "blank canvas" "ready for your own personal stamp" Well this property is exactly that. The paint is hardly dry and the smell of new carpet hits your nostrils as you walk inside but the rest of the home needs finishing off. Move in and take your time. A neat compact but not pokey home which comprises three bedrooms, one bathroom and single garage. On a corner site which often appeals to the boat or caravan owner to have side access.
This home would suit someone buying into the market for their first home, an investor or a downsizer who likes the idea of a smaller home and a garden to play in. The outside truly is a blank canvas. Veggie patches, flowers, trees or bushes all totally up to you.
Why not come along and take a look? Clifton springs is a suburb of choice because of its affordability and the lifestyle it offers. Walking, riding, fishing, golfing, eating and drinking are all right here.

Address: 90 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
AVANT-GARDE Cutting Edge Splendour
An architectural delight by Charles Maccora showcasing an exemplary display of quality craftsmanship, chic fittings, fixtures, and overall attention to detail.
If bespoke is what you seek, something truly special that is adorned with luxe features and complemented with stunning views, perhaps, this one of a kind abode may be the one for you.
This home screams "distinct" from the moment you lay eyes on it. The peculiarity of such a creation is certainly not typical of this location however, the contemporary fusion of luxury and comfort complete with Bay views gives you the ideal retreat.
Now, in terms of what we have on offer lets begin with the simplistic free flowing floor plan that has been designed with practicality and in such a way where all the space is utilised in an astute manner. A low maintenance manicured front entry through a grand timber door will set the theme for what comes next! The ground floor boasts impressive custom Messmate timber floors that follow throughout the home, a brilliant home office equipped with walk-in library, inbuilt desk with access to the back garden. 2 generous sized bedrooms both equipped with custom designed built-in- robes, ceiling fans and sliding door access onto the deck. Main bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, free standing bath, seamless tiled shower including niche box and rainfall shower head, stone vanity, WC, fantastic storage complete with Phoenix black tapware. A generous sized laundry with inbuilt custom cabinetry and access to the garden. The ground level is well equipped with an abundance of storage cupboards and cleverly completed with censor lights in the hallway and staircase.
The floating timber staircase effortlessly leads you up to the heart of the home which is certainly the WOW factor. A sensational open plan light filled area is not only practical but fantastic for entertaining in style. The galley style kitchen overlooking the dining and living is set to impress, lavish 60mm Caesarstone benchtop with power outlets and double in bench ceramic sink equipped with Zip tap instant boiling water and filtered cold water function complete with Bosch dishwasher, electric oven and 5 burner cooktop. The spacious lounge enjoys a stone stack mantel with gas feature fire and sophisticated aluminum stacker doors which open to the balcony and panoramic views. The master suite is pure luxury with an entirely decked out walk-in-robe, private balcony access and a retreat style ensuite with double shower including twin shower heads, free standing bath, custom skylight, WC and storage. The first floor is complete with a handy 4th bedroom.
Low maintenance gardens front and back with garden shed and 3000L water tank, deck, and alfresco area.
Features of this home include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, ceiling fans, feature gas fire, custom lighting, quality window furnishings, lockable sliders including screen doors throughout, Blackbutt exterior decking, Messmate custom floors, feature tiles, double glazed and tinted windows and double lock up garage with remote/internal/external access and additional workshop.
No expense has been spared for this Clifton Springs masterpiece offering practicality, convenience, comfort, luxury, Bay views, lifestyle, flanked for amenities including proximity to the Bay, golf course, shops and schools all at such an affordable price point. An inspection is a must to understand what is on offer.

Description:
Country style living - Ideal First Home, Investment or Downsizer!
Looking for low-maintenance living but still need room to store a caravan or boat and the addition of a workshop - then this is the home for you!
Presenting a fantastic opportunity for first homebuyers, investors, and downsizers alike, you'll need to act quickly to secure this Leopold gem!
Tucked away in a peaceful pocket, you'll love that this location still places life's conveniences within easy reach. This solid brick 3 bedroom home is located on a generous 679SQM corner allotment. Ready to be moved in and enjoyed step inside to a large open family room with separate dining. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a large built-in pantry, dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, and rangehood. The generous open kitchen/dining zone flows out onto the fantastic outdoor alfresco area - creating an indoor-outdoor flow that is perfect for everyday living and hosting loved ones.
The Master Bedroom features a Built-in robe and Ensuite. Two additional bedrooms are complete with built-in robes, with the third bedroom offering versatility as a study or home office. The bathroom is graced with a large shower, bathtub, and single vanity with separate toilet and a large laundry has access outside, with an abundance of storage throughout this cleverly designed home.
You'll be in comfort all year long thanks to the open fire place, gas wall heater and ceiling fans. Extra inclusions include a 3KW Solar power system and a near new Gas Hot water system.
Easy care gardens surround the home, with established vegetable gardens and fruit trees. The remote double lock-up car-port has access straight through to a large 6x9 metre shed,a secure trailor port and an additional garden shed with access through to the back yard.
The Gateway Plaza is conveniently close by for your shopping and dining needs, while the nearby Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds will delight fitness enthusiasts. Young families will appreciate easy access to the Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Hub. Public transport is moments away, while superior access to the Portarlington Highway makes traveling to Geelong or the Bellarine Peninsula a breeze.
Low-maintenance living with a few extra perks, this home will impress! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Two Bedroom Unit -Perfect Position!
This low maintenance two bedroom unit is located approximately 800 metres from the Gateway Plaza and Gateway Sanctuary. Set back from the street front, this low maintenance unit features open plan living, dining and kitchen opening onto the rear alfresco entertaining area perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing with friends. The kitchen is well equipped with freestanding stove, corner pantry and ample bench and cupboard space. Two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, bathroom with bath, shower and vanity, separate toilet and laundry. Split system ensures your heating and cooling comfort year round. Single car garage with internal access.

Description:
Beautiful family home in a great location.
Situated on 978m2, in a highly desirable pocket of Leopold, and surrounded in meticulously manicured gardens, this spacious and delightful home is perfect for those who settle for nothing less than perfection. This classically styled, red brick residence stands proud in an elevated position to capture pristine views over Geelong, while being close to the shops, walking distance to the Leopold sportsman's club and just a 15 minute drive to Geelong.
Comprising 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, formal and informal living, and a private and secure backyard, this property is sure to appeal to those searching for space, quality, and privacy. The quality and craftsmanship of this home stand out as soon as you set foot in this charming home. From the beautiful slate flooring to the decorative timber beadboard and high ceilings throughout, it's hard to fault the heart and soul that has gone into the design and build of this remarkable abode.
At the heart of the home, the opulent formal living area welcomes guests on entry and features decorative light fittings, and a stunning exposed brick wall with central wood fire - certainly one of the most spacious living rooms on offer in Leopold.
The kitchen features quality blackwood cabinetry with plentiful storage, dishwasher, ceramic cooktop, and gas oven and overlooks the open plan living and dining area with feature timber ceilings and a beautiful outlook over the backyard. Through sliding doors, the beautiful alfresco area provides a great place to entertain or simply enjoy the views over Geelong while being encased with flourishing greenery in all directions.
Accommodation is well-appointed and features a luxurious main bedroom with walk-in robe, ceiling fan, and ensuite with spa bath. 2 more bedrooms offer large built-in robes and a large study located near the master bedroom could be the perfect nursery or 4th bedroom if desired. The lavish central bathroom offers a large shower, bath, and a separate toilet; great when entertaining guests.
Notable features include:
- Split system air conditioning in the main living
- Central heating throughout
- Double garage with rear roller door access to the backyard
- Large hand-crafted garden shed
- Large laundry with great storage
- Ducted Vacuum
- 4.5kw PV Solar System
This exceptional property is located within walking or riding distance to the Bellarine Rail Trail and Leopold Sportsman's Club, just a short stroll to public transport, a 5-minute drive to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula and all of its fine wineries, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, and quality, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!

Description:
Genuine Renovators Delight
Set in a family-friendly neighbourhood, this prime example of a fixer-upperer would serve as a fantastic family home with a bit of hard work and TLC.
Positioned on a sizeable allotment of approx. 604m2 and zoned Residential Growth Schedule 2, this property also lends itself to being developed further to capitalise upon views over Geelong, or into a 2-lot subdivision (STCA).
The home itself comprises;
4 good-sized bedrooms, master with WIR & ensuite
2 x separate living zones, ideal for adults and kids entertainment
Enclosed alfresco/courtyard plus separate rear verandah
Double-length carport ideal for boats/caravans/trailers
Extras include; Gas wall heater, electric a/c unit, secure front gate
All your major amenities are conveniently located with the Dorothy Street shops, Leopold Primary School, Allanvale Pre School and public transport all within walking distance, with the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre a short drive away.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Ultimate family home on enormous block
Set on a huge 1153 sqm (approx.) block, this well-presented brick home has undergone quality renovations, and boasts a bright interior with Tasmanian Oak flooring, modern kitchen with extras, and two spacious, inviting living zones. The double carport, extensive driveway and enormous rear lock-up garage provide multiple options for storing vehicles and/or toys or tools. Offering an abundance of space, and located close to schools and sporting facilities, this is the ultimate family home you've been searching for.
The master bedroom offers a generous WIR with in-built shelving and drawers, and roomy ensuite with oversized shower, grey-marbled floor tiles and dual vanity. All bedrooms have plush grey carpets and cabinetry with in-built drawers, and are serviced by the home's main bathroom with family bath, shower, vanity and separate WC. The laundry has ample storage and direct external access.
Floor-to-ceiling cabinetry, grey stone benchtops and 900mm Smeg appliances feature in the high-quality, recently-renovated kitchen. No expense has been spared, with extras including USB power points, zoned overhead LED lighting, and an abundance of soft-close cupboards and drawers with handy concealed powerpoints inside each pantry.
Entertain family and friends on the undercover, wrap-around paved alfresco area overlooking the rear yard with its vast expanse of lawn bordered by established greenery. An elevated cubby with slide offers the perfect hideaway for the kids. The impressive industrial-sized lock-up garage with roller door access and lean-to, has heavy-duty wiring with a 15 Amp outlet, and low-maintenance garden beds comprise the remainder of the yard. Call Charles to arrange an inspection ASAP.
- Huge block, with vast rear lawn and cubby house for the kids
- Extensive high-quality renovations with lots of extras
- Large industrial garage provides plenty of storage for vehicles/boats/caravans
- Two living zones allow plenty of room for the family to spread out
- 3 split systems & gas ducted heating ensure year-round comfort
- Located close to schools, reserves and sporting facilities
* Fletchers Coronavirus Update *
In light of recent events, Fletchers have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
- You are feeling unwell
- Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
- Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
- You are under strict self-isolation instructions
- You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
- Our agents may restrict number of people inspecting the property at any one time
- You refrain from touching surfaces, doorhandles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Tranquil Oasis!
Admire the private position and exclusive style of this single-level villa, set well back from the street and tailor made for easy enjoyment. 2/9 Gaddang Court is a great opportunity to buy into the booming Clifton Springs property market.
This secluded oasis, is a beautifully presented blank canvas with its house-like feel and proportions with low maintenance gardens ensuring that it represents a brilliant down-size option with outstanding lock and leave credentials.
Upon entering the home you are greeted with a property that is well-designed and features a spacious feel and distinction. The stunning kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a generous bench, which leads to the impressively stylish and spacious lounge/dining area. Boasting 3 generous bedrooms, 2 with generous built in robes and the master bedroom offering a welcome hint of indulgence with an ensuite and walk-in robe.
To further compliment the home it's located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for. Only a short stroll to public transport, access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this superb location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.

Description:
A Hidden Gem In A Convenient Locale!
Sitting proudly on its own title, this property promises easy living on approx. 643m2! The kitchen, bathroom, and laundry have all been beautifully renovated within the last year. Plus, the north-facing backyard will delight those who are seeking low-maintenance living without compromising on outdoor space!
Convenient living doesnt get better than this with both Leopold P.S and the Leopold Community Centre just a short walk from your front door. Public transport is also within easy walking distance, while the Gateway Plaza and Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds are moments away. Just jump in the car, and youll soon be in the heart of Geelong or exploring the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
Inside, the interiors are in immaculate condition. Both the lounge and living area unite with the dining/kitchen zone, creating a sense of flow throughout the lower level. With the lounge opening onto the wrap-around deck, youll love that you can enjoy a cup of tea while overlooking the backyard.
The kitchen exudes style with stone benchtops and a black glass splashback. The built-in pantry provides storage, while stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher, bar fridge, and Westinghouse oven, gas hob, rangehood.
The laundry and separate toilet complete the lower level.
Upstairs is home to three bedrooms (two with built-in robes, one with walk-in robe) and a stunning bathroom. Graced with a freestanding tub, open shower, dual vanity, and toilet, this space is the perfect pampering zone.
With two of the bedrooms boasting west-facing views, youll love soaking up the lights over Geelong at night.
Two split-system air conditioners and a ceiling fan provide modern comfort. The easy-care gardens leave you free to enjoy the more important things in life, while the fake timber deck is another low-maintenance feature.
The remote single lock-up garage boasts internal access, plus room for storage or a workshop. Off-street parking is also provided for an additional two vehicles.
Whether youre dreaming of owning your own home, searching for a great investment, or simply looking for easy living, this home will delight. Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in a Fantastic Location
The Phone Code for this property is: 77032. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
This imposing 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom unit, being the front unit of only 2 on the block (so no Body Corporate fees) is situated in an established quiet pocket of Leopold and only a short walk to Gateway Plaza and all it has to offer. Suitable for downsizers, investors or first home buyers, this property is sure to please. Fully renovated just over 3 years ago it offers two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, wall to wall carpet and quality block out and privacy blinds.
The spacious L shaped kitchen, dining and living area features Blackbutt vinyl plank flooring, downlights, block out and privacy blinds together with a Vulcan wall heater and split system air conditioning. The kitchen includes stainless steel gas stove top, with electric oven and range hood a pantry and plenty of cupboard and bench space.
The impressive bathroom features floor to ceiling tiles, dimmable downlights, freestanding bath, corner shower and glass top vanity. The separate toilet and laundry with storage and external access add the final touches to the floorplan.
Off the living area is a sliding door that leads into a private undercover entertainment area with built in water feature and access to the front yard and single lock up garage with remote controlled roller door. The rear of the property has a garden shed, access to the driveway and an unused area that could be used for additional parking, boat/trailer/caravan storage, veggie garden etc.
Close to shops, schools, medical facilities, sporting grounds, public transport and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula this property ticks all the boxes.

Description:
Picture Perfect, Complete with a Picket Fence!
Surrounded by lush, established gardens, this charming cottage offers a unique buying opportunity that is often sought yet rarely found.
Set behind a private high fence, this timeless abode is a sheer delight.
Split over 2 levels, the bottom comprises an open plan living with a cosy Coonara fire, dining and kitchen with SS appliances and an abundance of storage. 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes and a tranquil garden outlook, study nook, family bathroom and laundry complete this level. Float upstairs where you're welcomed by the 4th bedroom and an open 2nd living area with sliding door access to the balcony, which encompasses Bay views. The spacious master bedroom offers storage, serene bay windows and a fully equipped ensuite, making it the perfect parents retreat.
Set upon a generous 654m2 parcel, the back garden offers a wealth of opportunity and ready for you to add your own style - the choice is yours!
Located in a central pocket of Clifton Springs and with a rural aspect, this is perfect entry level buying on the booming Bellarine. Don't delay, this unique abode will not last long!

Description:
Charming Bayside Living
Split over 2 levels, this spacious and well zoned family home offers incredible value for money. Refurbished throughout, with scope to add your own personal touches, this home will delight and is perfect for those needing space for the whole family or a savvy investment/holiday home.
Set behind a private high fence upon a 585m2 parcel, you're welcomed by hardwood timber floors, adding instant warmth and character to the home. The open living area with feature gas log fire, flows into the combined dining and kitchen, equipped with SS appliances and ample storage. 2 bedrooms, 2nd with BIR, a multipurpose study/sitting room, central bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with outdoor access all occupy the bottom level. Upstairs offers retreat style living, where a sundrenched 2nd living area offers Bay views and balcony, with the master bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite and 4th bedroom with BIR completing this well zoned family home.
Flanked for choice, the spacious back garden is a blank canvas, ready for you to get creative and make your own oasis! A SLUG with rear access into the backyard offers potential to house the boat, caravans, multiple car's and all toys in between!
Location is paramount and with Clifton Springs Primary, tennis courts, skate park and play area right across the road and the boat ramp, Bay, golf course and specialty shops only a short stroll away, you can't get more central or convenient than this!

Description:
Peace & Tranquillity Await
This superbly positioned and lovingly cared for brick veneer home is a pleasure to inspect. Positioned on a 650m2 approx. allotment at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of Leopold. Located within close proximity to parks, Gateway Plaza and the Bellarine Rail Trail. This property is the ideal for any growing family or investor.
Upon entering the home, you are greeted by a generous lounge that leads through to the central hub of the home with a large dining / living room adjoined by an updated and functional kitchen. The well- appointed kitchen comprises all stainless-steel appliances, wall oven, electric cook top, dishwasher and ample cupboard and bench space.
Presenting four bedrooms with generous built in robes, main located at the front of the home and offering a private ensuite. The remain bedrooms utilise the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Outdoors offers a large undercover entertaining area that leads through to the magnificently landscaped gardens. An oversized single car garage allowing you enough room to store cars, boats, caravans or trailers and still leave enough space for a workshop.
Added extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a garden shed located in the rear yard.
Dont be the person that misses out on this amazing opportunity.

Description:
Private Resort Style Living in the Heart of Leopold
This is an immaculately kept Wookey built home with the touch and feel of a tropical retreat. This beautifully crafted property oozes class warmth and character. As you walk through the secret garden to the front door you are immediately taken to another world. The home has a flexible floor plan to suit your needs. Offering a stunning lounge & dining which has an amazing north facing aspect with a slow combustion wood heater & reverse cycle split system.
The tastefully modern kitchen is fully equipped with quality Miele appliances & stone benchtops. The adjoining open plan living is complemented by magnificent views of the pool and entertaining area and you will be comfortable in any season with a second reverse cycle split system.
A private main bedroom is an adult hideaway with a lovely renovated ensuite & secluded courtyard to call your own. Even when you are in the shower you will feel like you are in the tropics. Both remaining bedrooms are warm and inviting with great built in robe storage and easy access to the bathroom. Large picture windows from every room provide a wonderful aspect to the pool and garden.
The pool area is resort style living in your backyard and is the best place to enjoy summer nights. The perfectly maintained & lusciously gardens are easy to sustain with an extensive watering system. The double garage with remote control is a good size with and there is also an enclosed carport with side access for all your extra toys. A grassed area at the back is a great area for children to play and has two garden sheds which are neatly disguised among the numerous fruit trees which the new owner will enjoy for years to come. Oh and yes a chook run for you to enjoy fresh eggs daily.
This is a charming rustic modern house ready for you to call home. Throw away your passports as you will be in paradise every day in your own home.

Description:
This Could Be The One
Nestled within the family friendly Estuary Estate, this property is sure to exceed your expectations. Whether you are looking to break into the market with your first home, invest or wishing to downsize, this immaculate property is worth your attention.
Positioned in an ideal location, within a short stroll of local parks & playgrounds, sporting ovals and the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza, this property offers so much more than just a desirable location.
This beautiful home comprises four generous sized bedrooms, main complete with walk through robe and private ensuite. While remaining bedrooms utilize the stylish central bathroom and separate toilet. The spacious and light filled open plan living, kitchen and dining area, all overlook the superbly decked entertaining area. The fully equipped kitchen will leave you wanting nothing more. Complete with a stainless-steel 900mm free standing oven/ cooktop, dishwasher, built-in pantry, mirrored splash back and an abundance of bench space offering a large island breakfast bar. Offering an additional separate living area located at the front of the home, perfect for the whole family.
Just a step out through the glass stacker doors and you are standing on the fantastic decked entertaining area, making indoor outdoor entertaining easy. All while overlooking the low maintenance and secure yard.
Added extras include double lock up garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fan, downlights throughout, indoor skylight, garden shed for extra storage and beautifully landscaped gardens.
With the ever-expanding Gateway Shopping Centre just minutes away, easy access to the Geelong CBD and the many amenities of the Bellarine Peninsula. This home is immaculate throughout out and leaves nothing left to do. A perfect opportunity, dont miss out on this one!

Description:
Exciting Rural Lifestyle Opportunity
Set across 2.4 ha 5.9 acres approx of beautifully manicured land, this property is a must-see for anyone wanting to experience rural life without forgoing lifes luxuries. All bases are covered with three paddocks, ample shedding, attractive gardens, and a modern 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom plus study home with an enormous garage and swimming pool. With the hard work already done, this enviable lifestyle is yours for the taking.
Recently renovated, features include tallowwood flooring, and a stylish kitchen with granite & stone composite benches, 900mm cooker and soft-close cabinetry. Admire the abundant rose garden, verdant lawns & mature elms from the living areas which flow seamlessly to an extravagant outdoor room boasting all the extras: TV with Foxtel, bar, BBQ - kitchen, ceiling fan, cafe blinds and wood heater. 28 solar panels help power the home, allowing for guilt-free operation of the twin ducted split systems year-round. Waters not an issue either, with 60,000-litre storage in place. Grey/rainwater reticulation supports three raised veggie boxes, a greenhouse and an extremely productive orchard. NBN internet connection is strong.
The master bedroom comes with WIR & ensuite; the other 3 have floor-to-ceiling wardrobes. Bathrooms are opulent; the main bathroom boasts a walk-in shower and large bath.
Enjoy a tree change in a central location on the Bellarine Peninsula, a short drive to major shops, schools and attractions, just 90 minutes from Melbourne and 20 minutes from Geelong.. Call Peter Lindeman today!
